about_the_game:
"Maid In Heaven" is a 2D Metroidvania game with hardcore combat and diverse collection elements as its selling points. Players will play the role of a coffee shop maid who comes to heaven after death. In order to find her memories before her death and unlock the secrets of heaven, she embarks on a fantasy and thrilling journey.

Game Features:

-Rich weapons and equipment system:

From sharp daggers to heavy swords, each weapon has a unique combat method and skill combination. Through exploration and challenges, unlock more equipment and create your own combat style.

-In-depth item collection mechanism:

There are countless secrets hidden in the game waiting to be discovered, from rare props to precious collectibles, each of which can add new fun to your adventure.

-Fascinating background story:

In this beautiful and terrifying heaven, players will experience a moving story about courage, sacrifice and hope. As the plot develops, you will meet a variety of characters who will guide you forward.

-Free difficulty selection:

You can choose from four difficulty levels, there will always be one that suits you.

Whether you are an adventurer who likes to explore unknown areas in depth, or an action game enthusiast who pursues extreme challenges, "Maid In Heaven" will provide you with an unforgettable gaming experience. Are you ready to step into this world?
